table.name: Hotstart Enrichment Decay Delay
table.description: Delay before the Initial Hotstart Enrichment is decayed by the decay step value.

table.name: Hotstart Enrichment Decay Step
table.description: Step value that is decayed from the initial enrichment every time the counter increments.

table.name: Initial Hotstart Enrichment (High)
table.description: Initial High Enrichment. This is applied when BOTH high enrichment thresholds are met.

table.name: Hotstart High Enrichment Activation Threshold (Coolant Temperature)
table.description: Minimum Coolant Temperature threshold for high enrichment.

table.name: Hotstart High Enrichment Activation Threshold (Intake Air Temperature)
table.description: Minimum Intake Air Temperature threshold for high enrichment.

table.name: Initial Hotstart Enrichment (Low)
table.description: Initial Low Enrichment. This is applied when ANY high enrichment threshold is not met AND both low enrichment thresholds are met.

table.name: Hotstart Low Enrichment Activation Threshold (Coolant Temperature)
table.description: Minimum Coolant Temperature threshold for low enrichment.

table.name: Hotstart Low Enrichment Activation Threshold (Minimum Intake Air Temperature)
table.description: Minimum Intake Air Temperature threshold for low enrichment.

table.name: Maximum Non-Idle Hotstart Enrichment (Post Delay)
table.description: Maximum Non-Idle enrichment after the Hotstart Maximum Non-Idle Enrichment delay.

table.name: Hotstart Maximum Non-Idle Enrichment Delay
table.description: Delay before Maximum Non-Idle Hotstart Enrichment limit is applied.

table.name: Hotstart Minimum Enrichment Limit Runtime
table.description: Determines how long the minimum enrichment limit is enabled.

table.name: Hotstart Minimum Enrichment (During Delay and Runtime)
table.description: Minimum enrichment limit that is only active during decay delay and hotstart minimum enrichment runtime.
